attributes.title: Bunker Boy’s done it again
attributes.review: With its poor design and mediocre user interface, the Trump 2020 app demonstrates the most important aspects of Donald’s presidency. A waste of tax money.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Soon after downloading my phone started glitching

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I wanted to download this to keep up with news but soon realizes the fake news that it shares. Unreliable and not useful.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE but yet helps when you are dying, all I have to say is i 💕 cut 😔 my 😳 finger 👆 on ❌ my 🥰 moms 👩🏻 ring 💍 i 😌 hope 😭 i 😚 can 🤠 still 💃 dance

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review: If you download this app, it will infect your phone with viruses such as racism!!! It will turn you into a racist!!! Don’t do it!!! Once you catch it, there’s no cure!!

attributes.title: A Clown 🤡 🤡
attributes.review: Instead of free healthcare the president decided to give us this free app that was a total rip off and full of FAKE NEWS. It’s all just about supporting some clown!

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: This app is the worst app that was ever created. It gives you no truthful information. This administration is just filling their supporters with lies.

attributes.title: Moaning Tortoise
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I showed it to my pet tortoise and it started moaning and now it won’t stop so I don’t recommend this app

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: this app told me to come back to where I came from, put my kids in cages, robbed me and gave all my money to my local police department

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: it’s horrible it crashes every time and it gave me multiple virus
